001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007
008/**
009 * Information about an active ZeroMQ notification. An array of this type is returned by the {@code getzmqnotifications} JSON-RPC method.
010 */
011public class ZmqNotification {
012    private final String type;
013    private final URI address;
014    private final int hwm;
015
016    @JsonCreator
017    public ZmqNotification(@JsonProperty("type")    String type,
018                           @JsonProperty("address") String address,
019                           @JsonProperty("hwm")     int hwm) {
020        this.type = type;
021        this.address = URI.create(address);
022        this.hwm = hwm;
023    }
024
025    /**
026     * @return Type of notification
027     */
028    public String type() {
029        return type;
030    }
031
032    /**
033     * @return Address of the publisher
034     */
035    public URI address() {
036        return address;
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * @return Outbound message high water mark
041     */
042    public int hwm() {
043        return hwm;
044    }
045
046    @Deprecated public String getType() { return type(); }
047    @Deprecated public URI getAddress() { return address(); }
048    @Deprecated public int getHwm() { return hwm(); }
049}
